name: Fran Haraway
bio: Fran Haraway is a retired schoolteacher and children’s poet. Her poetry has been collected in Lee Bennett Hopkins’s anthologies Sharing the Season: A Book of Poems (2010, illustrated by David Diaz) and Yummy! Eating Through the Day (2000, illustrated by Renee Flower). With Barbara Geldersma, she is the author of the cross-curricular activity book 12 Totally Terrific Theme Units (1993).
